CustomField.formula:
if( TEXT(Month(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate))) == '10' || TEXT(Month(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate))) == '11' || TEXT(Month(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate))) == '12', TEXT(Month(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate))) +' ' + TEXT(Year(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate))),
'0'+TEXT(Month(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate))) +' ' + TEXT(Year(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate))))
CustomField.label: Created Month Year
